metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15919 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: Remotely observable behaviour in auth-gss2.c in OpenSSH through 7.8 couldbe used by remote attackers to detect existence of users on a target systemwhen GSS2 is in use. NOTE: the discoverer states 'We understand that theOpenSSH developers do not want to treat such a username enumeration (or"oracle") as a vulnerability.'

criterions.comment: openssh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
openssh-ssh1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
